name: my dream
description: This is a game of fighting monsters, leveling, buying equipment and spending the night.Waiting to watch yourself slowly become stronger and gain a sense of accomplishment I hope to support amateur independent game developers.
minimum_requirements: OS: windows 7,8,10 Processor: cpu 2.4Ghz Memory: 128 MB RAM Graphics: gt650 Storage: 400 MB available space Sound Card:
